description: Your inspiration guides your strikes when you take a moment to assess your foe.

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Amateur Investigator, base attack bonus +6, 1 rank in at least one Knowledge skill, no levels in a class that has the inspiration class feature.

sections.text: You can expend one use of inspiration as a move action to study a single enemy that you can see. When you do so, you gain a +2 insight bonus on melee attack rolls and a +2 bonus on damage rolls for a number of rounds equal to your Intelligence modifier. The bonus on damage rolls is precision damage, and is not multiplied on a critical hit. Once affected by this feat, a target cannot be affect by your use of it again for 24 hours.

prerequisites: 1 rank in at least one Knowledge skill
